  "description": "Work Dey HR Services - Our client, a luxury fashion boutique in Maitama, is recruiting to fill the position below:

Job Position: Personal Assistant to the MD

Job Location:&nbsp;Maitama,&nbsp;Abuja (FCT)
Employment Type: Full-time

Summary


	Are you highly organized, discreet, and passionate about fashion and executive support?
	We are seeking a polished and proactive Personal Assistant to support the Managing Director in day-to-day operations, strategic initiatives, and high-level engagements.


Key Responsibilities


	Provide high-level administrative support to the MD, including calendar management, travel coordination, and meeting preparation
	Act as a liaison between the MD and internal/external stakeholders
	Handle confidential information with discretion and professionalism
	Assist in project management, reporting, and follow-ups on strategic tasks
	Coordinate logistics for fashion events, client meetings, and brand collaborations
	Prepare presentations, correspondence, and executive briefs as needed
	Ensure the MD&rsquo;s day runs smoothly with attention to detail and foresight.


Requirements


	Interested candidates should possess a Bachelor`s / Master`s Degree
	Minimum of 3 years of experience as a Personal Assistant or Executive Assistant
	Exceptional organizational and multitasking skills
	Strong written and verbal communication abilities
	Proficiency in Microsoft Office Suite and digital productivity tools
	Professional appearance and a calm, composed demeanor
	Experience in fashion, luxury retail, or hospitality is an added advantage
	Ability to work flexible hours and adapt to a fast-paced environment.


Perks


	Competitive salary (N150,000 - N250,000 monthly)&nbsp;with performance bonuses
	Exposure to high-level fashion industry operations
	Opportunities for career growth and development
	Stylish and supportive work culture
	Access to exclusive fashion events and brand perks.


Method of Application
Interested and qualified candidates should send their CV and a brief cover letter to:&nbsp;career.wsl@gmail.com&nbsp;using &ldquo;Personal Assistant to MD &ndash; Maitama Boutique&quot;&nbsp;as the subject of the mail.",

HR Officer Job at WhiteSpace Integrated Services Limited




        
    

        
        WhiteSpace Integrated Services Limited is a Human Capital Management company. We offer bespoke HR solutions ranging from recruitment, hiring, onboarding, training, outsourcing and general human capital consultation.

We are recruiting to fill the position below:

Job Position: HR Officer

Job Location: Owerri, Imo
Employment Type: Full-time

Job Brief
     

            
    




	The HR Officer will support the effective delivery of HR services across the organization.
	This role involves handling day-to-day HR operations including recruitment, employee relations, performance management, payroll support, and compliance with labor regulations.
	The ideal candidate will be proactive, organized, and people-oriented with strong knowledge of HR practices.


Key Responsibilities


	Assist in the recruitment, selection, and onboarding process of employees.
	Maintain employee records (attendance, leave, contracts, etc.) in line with company policies.
	Support HR initiatives such as training, performance reviews, and employee engagement activities.
	Ensure compliance with labor laws, health & safety regulations, and internal policies.
	Handle employee queries and provide guidance on HR policies and procedures.
	Support disciplinary and grievance management processes.
	Prepare HR reports and contribute to HR planning activities.
	Assist with payroll preparation by providing accurate data on attendance, leaves, and overtime.
	Promote a positive organizational culture and foster teamwork across departments.


Qualifications & Experience


	Bachelor’s Degree in Human Resource Management, Industrial Relations, Business
	2 - 4 years of HR experience (preferably in logistics, cargo operations, or a related industry).
	Certification (CIPM, SHRM, CIPD or equivalent) is an advantage.
	Sound knowledge of Nigerian labor laws and HR best practices.
	Proficiency in MS Office and HR software tools.
	Strong interpersonal, communication, and organizational skills.
	Male candidate preferred.


Key Competencies:


	Confidentiality & Integrity
	Attention to Detail
	Problem-Solving & Initiative
	Teamwork & Collaboration
	Excellent Communication Skills


Why Choose Us?


	Salary: N120,000 monthly.
	As a Human Capital Management company, we aim to offer you a flexible and streamline HR services at a cost reflective of your budget.
	Our goal is to help you achieve tangible benefits in the areas of cost savings, quality staff as well as amplified service level performances.


Method of Application
Interested and qualified candidates should send their CV to: whitespaceservice605@gmail.com using the Job Position as the subject of the email.

  "description": "Ave Maria Multipurpose Investment Limited is a registered limited liability company strategically located in Oyo, Oyo State, Nigeria. We specialize in the sourcing, processing, and supply of high-quality agricultural commodities to both local and international markets.
